title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons

constellations_other.name: The Third Place
constellations_other.description: Explore how Eddie’s Lil’ Homies fits into the broader history of the third place on screen, demonstrating how public spaces away from home, work and school are important sites for friendship, community building and support across generations.

description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons (2020) is a social simulation game by Nintendo. The player controls a character who moves to a deserted island, accomplishing assigned tasks, and develops the island as they choose.
description_for_label: Animal Crossing: New Horizons (2020) is a social simulation game by Nintendo. The player controls a character who moves to a deserted island, accomplishing assigned tasks, and develops the island as they choose.
